document_data.name: Miirphys Irithyl
document_data.mainbody: '''Miirphys Irithyl''' was fourth [[Coronal]] of [[Cormanthyr]], having led the city for hundreds of years from {{Yearlink|-1338}} to {{Yearlink|-791}}. He was a revered priest of [[Sehanine Moonbow]] and was remarkable as the only [[moon elf]] to rule the empire as Coronal.
document_data.Activities: He did lots of work sending ships into [[Realmspace]] to prevent the incursions of [[Netheril | Netherese]] spelljammers from expanding into his domain.
document_data.Possessions: Unlike other coronals, Miirphys only raised the '''[[Rulers' Blade]]'' once, during the blade-ritual, and never again.
document_data.History:
Coronal Miirphys was known for for raising the [[Crescent Court]], a temple of his patron deity [[Sehanine Moonbow]], in the {{Yearlink|-1293}}. 

He was also known for having imprisoned the [[Trio Nefarious]], a band of [[nycaloths]]. These fiends returned to the realm centuries later, causing the downfall of his empire in the 8{{th}} century [[DR]]. 

Lastly, Miirphys was involved in the binding the demon-consorting elves of [[House Dlardrageth]] to their villa in [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: It was rumored that Coronal Miirphys returned to the Crescent Court after his death, in the form of either a [[ghost]], [[baelnorn]], or even as one of the elven [[Reverend Ones]].
